creator: stuart@its.washington.edu
text:
2 points, both regarding the sql core task.

The sql task prints 'N rows affected' if the print attribute is on.  Please 
separate the logic for the printing of this footer from the printing of any 
actual result text.   Currently the two appear tied together to a single 
boolean state variable (named print) in the SQLExec.java class.

Also, the delimiter for output fields is hard coded as ','.  This becomes a 
subsequent parsing issue if some of the output fields are of type string and 
contain commas in their value.  Please parameterise the value of the output 
file field delimiter, keeping comma as the default perhaps.

I'm quite happy to contribute these enhancements myself but do not know how to 
go about this.

first point is a duplicate of bug #27446 fixed in 1.7.0

the "delimiter" part is a duplicate of bug #35627 fixed in 1.8.0
